parameters.query:
UPDATE purchase_invoices SET
  paid_amount = {{ $json.paid_amount }},
  paid_at = CASE WHEN {{ $json.paid_amount }} > 0 AND paid_at IS NULL THEN now() ELSE paid_at END
WHERE lexware_voucher_id = '{{ $json.related_voucher_id }}'
RETURNING id, invoice_number, total_gross, paid_amount;

UPDATE sales_invoices SET
  paid_amount = {{ $('Parse Payment').item.json.paid_amount }},
  paid_at = CASE WHEN {{ $('Parse Payment').item.json.paid_amount }} > 0 AND paid_at IS NULL THEN now() ELSE paid_at END,
  status = CASE
    WHEN {{ $('Parse Payment').item.json.paid_amount }} >= total_gross THEN 'PAID'::sales_invoice_status
    WHEN {{ $('Parse Payment').item.json.paid_amount }} > 0 THEN 'OPEN'::sales_invoice_status
    ELSE status
  END
WHERE lexware_invoice_id = '{{ $('Parse Payment').item.json.related_voucher_id }}'
RETURNING id, invoice_number, total_gross, paid_amount, status::text;
